channel.title: Podcasts
channel.description: Podcasts, with host Chuck Evans, from around the golf world. Listen to some of the games best Instructors, mental game gurus, equipment experts and more!

item.title: Tigers Streak
item.description: How does Tiger's current streak compare with the old one?
item.author: chuck@chuckevansgolf.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Tiger's Streak
item.itunes:summary: Listen in as we discuss Tiger Woods'current streak.
item.itunes:author: Chuck Evans - Evans News Media
item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting, tiger woods

item.title: The Games of Golf
item.description: Did you know that there are FOUR games within the game of golf?
item.author: chuck@chuckevansgolf.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Games of Golf
item.itunes:summary: Listen in as we discuss the four games within each game of golf.
item.itunes:author: Chuck Evans - Evans News Media
item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.title: Playing Tournament Golf
item.description: The Difference Between Playing Golf With Your Friends and Playing Tournament Golf
item.author: chuck@chuckevansgolf.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Playing Tournament Golf
item.itunes:summary: .Playing tournament golf is different then playing golf with your buddies. Listen in to find out what's different.
item.itunes:author: Chuck Evans - Evans News Media
item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.title: The Basis of Golf
item.description: The six steps to playing consistent golf.
item.author: chuck@chuckevansgolf.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Basis of Golf
item.itunes:summary: Did you know that ALL golf strokes have the same basis for proper execution?
item.itunes:author: Chuck Evans - Evans News Media
item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.title: What Does A Straight Left Arm Mean In Golf?
item.description:
We've all heard the phrase, "Keep your left arm straight" but what exactly does this mean?

In this podcast we discuss what it IS and ISN'T!

For more information on your can become the best player you can be visit us at
www.medicusgolfinstitute.com
item.author: chuck@chuckevansgolf.com
item.itunes:subtitle: What Exactly IS a Straight Left Arm In Golf?
item.itunes:summary: Find out what a straight left arm and isn't.
item.itunes:author: Chuck Evans - Evans News Media
item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.title: The Magic of The Right Forearm
item.description: Learn how to control the golf club by using the Right Forearm.
item.author: chuck@chuckevansgolf.com
item.itunes:subtitle: There's "MAGIC" In The Right Forearm.
item.itunes:summary: Did you know that bending and straightening the right arm raises and lowers the golf club and cock & uncocks the left wrist?
item.itunes:author: Chuck Evans - Evans News Media
item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.title: Playing in the Cold Weather
item.description: Tips on how to play golf in the cold weather.
item.author: chuck@chuckevansgolf.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Playing in cold weather can be tough.
item.itunes:summary: Hear what Chuck Evans has to say about playing in cold weather.
item.itunes:author: Chuck Evans - Evans News Media
item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.title: Playing In The Wind
item.description: Learn some of the keys to playing effective golf in windy conditions.
item.author: chuck@chuckevansgolf.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Hate playing golf in the wind?
item.itunes:summary: Learn how to play golf in the wind and actually enjoy it!
item.itunes:author: Chuck Evans - Evans News Media
item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.title: Playing In The Rain
item.description: Listen in as we discuss how to play golf in the rain.
item.author: chuck@chuckevansgolf.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Put on your rain suit.
item.itunes:summary: Hate playing in the rain - we all do. Here's a few tips to make it more enjoyable.
item.itunes:author: Chuck Evans - Evans News Media
item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.title: The Computer
item.description: Golfers must program their "computers" to play effective golf.
item.author: chuck@chuckevansgolf.com
item.itunes:subtitle: There are two computers in golf.
item.itunes:summary: You have to program both computers to be successful on the golf course.
item.itunes:author: Chuck Evans - Evans News Media
item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.title: Alex Sloan
item.description: An interview with Alex Sloan who was in the FIRST Authorized Instructor conducted by the late Homer Kelley.

item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Alex Sloan

item.itunes:author: Chuck Evans - Evans News Media
item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.title: Ron Gring
item.description: Golf Magazine Top 100 Teacher Ron Gring talks about why players don't achieve their maximum potential and how to go to the next level.

item.itunes:summary: Chuck and Ron talk about working with Tour Players, Juniors, and amateurs.

item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.title: Bobby Clampett
item.description: Former Tour player and current CBS golf announcer talks about his career and the transition between the golf course to the broadcasting booth.
item.author: chuck@chuckevansgolf.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Former PGA Tour star - Bobby Clampett
item.itunes:summary: Chuck and Bobby discuss life after the tour, his work on CBS, and the most important aspect of his life.
item.itunes:author: Chuck Evans - Evans News Media
item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.title: Carey Mumford
item.description: Carey discusses how proper mental game programming can elevate your game.

item.itunes:summary: What goes on in a players head when they are on the golf course?

item.itunes:keywords: golf, golf instruction, chuck evans, medicus, golf radio, sports radio, podcasting

item.itunes:summary: Chuck and Travis talk about working with players of all skill levels.
